document_data.name: Scantshar
document_data.base: [[Sevenecho (hamlet)|Sevenecho]], [[the Vast]]{{Cite dungeon/75/Into the Nest of Vipers|67-68}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Scantshar''' was the name of a prominent [[human]] family in the [[hamlet]] of [[Sevenecho (hamlet)|Sevenecho]] in [[the Vast]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: The Scantshar family was distrusted and treated with slight suspicion by other village folk. This was largely due to the fact that the family matriarch, [[Riliyyn Scantshar]], was a [[wizard]] of some accomplishment.
document_data.History: As one of the more prominent families, the Scantshars also contributed a member to the council of elders that governed Sevenecho, around [[1369 DR]].Given her seniority and authority, Riliyyn Scantshar may be this member of this council of elders.
